newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Sept 25.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Sept 25.

text.p: Following is a summary of major Chinese political and business stories in leading newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Beijing. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy. Telephone: (8610) 6532-1921. Fax: (8610) 6532-4978.
Military officials and troops should study hard Marxist philosophy and Deng Xiaoping thought to lead China into the 21st century.
China will pursue an "active defence" policy to ensure it has sufficient force to defend its national sovereignty.
Deposits in rural financial institutions reached nearly 1.7 trillion yuan by the end of August.
The People's Insurance Co's Property Insurance Ltd Co recovered $200 million in bad loans from an unidentified country.
